title: Betray Atlantis
description: Trapped in the ruined city of Atlantis, Quentin must keep his wits about him if he is to survive his stay. Not all the natives are glad to welcome the unsuspecting teen into their midst, and some immediately begin to plot his demise. The scheming denizens of Atlantis are the least of his worries. When some of them are found mutilated and murdered, Quentin is blamed for their untimely deaths.Forced to make new alliances that test the limits of his patience, Quentin struggles to find trustworthy allies.What has happened to Bertie?Where is Tyrin?Alone in a strange land Quentin must learn to defend himself or he will not live long enough to escape Atlantis.
author: Dayton Idoni
